Article Title: “Wasn’t always like this” - Dwyane Wade’s wife Gabrielle Union gets emotional as NBA veteran’s gesture leaves her speechless
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Gabrielle Union reacts to Dwyane Wade’s heartfelt gesture towards hosts of Today with Jenna and Sheinelle

Watch TODAY with Jenna & Sheinelle Full Episode - January 14

Gabrielle Union points out Dwyane Wade’s irritating on-board habit

Also Read:

Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union share one of the most adorable relationships within the NBA . The duo have shown love, appreciation and support for each other publicly in various instances. Recently, Gabrielle got emotional during her appearance on one of the episodes of Today with Jenna and Sheinelle. The host of the show, Jenna Bush Hager, was complimenting Dwyane’s gestures, which left the American actress almost speechless. Gabrielle was visibly proud of Dwayne’s growth, as she stated that the NBA veteran wasn’t always like this.Recently, the couple was seen enjoying their annual Wade World Trip. This time it was Japan, Tokyo and Osaka. While fans have already been treated to some of the adorable moments from the trip, the recent viral clip adds to the wholesomeness. The love between Dwyane and Gabrielle feels never-ending, with such instances popping up every now and then.The episode of Today with Jenna and Sheinelle featuring Gabrielle Union went live on January 14, 2026. Jenna Bush Hager, one of the hosts of the show, started the episode by recollecting a memory of Dwyane Wade’s gesture. Jenna addressed the NBA athlete as her “bestie” and went on to narrate a heartfelt experience involving the veteran athlete.“I don’t know if you know this, but he did the most thoughtful thing ever,” she started narrating, holding up a card. “I actually brought it. This is usually in my bar. It has a little wine on it from the usage.” It was a handwritten note from the athlete for Jenna. The note had the most important dates of the host’s life, including each of her children’s birthdays and her own birthday, as well as the anniversary date. Dwyane sent a bottle of wine for each of these dates.Gabrielle looked visibly proud and got emotional listening to her husband’s thoughtful gesture. She stated, “He is so freakishly thoughtful. And he is such a planner and he likes to really make sure that the thought goes into it.” The American actress admitted that he has not always been the same. “You know this has been an evolution. It wasn’t always like this. But he has always been the one to like to write poetry or to just come up with really thoughtful gifts,” Gabrielle concluded her statement while being emotional.In the same interview, Gabrielle Union pointed out one of the most irritating habits of Dwyane Wade that irks the American actress. “There have been times, D will wait until they’re about to call boarding, ‘I’ve got to go to the bathroom,’” Gabrielle recalled. “Right now? Or, ‘I want to go grab a burger.’ We’ve been here for three hours! Why right now? That’s a good way to start one [argument] as you’re boarding.” This came up when the trio were discussing the most annoying circumstances that come up at an airport.
Article Summary: The episode of today with jenna and sheinelle featuring gabrielle union went live on january 14, 2026. Jenna bush hager, one of the hosts of the show, started the episode by recollecting a memory of dwyane wade’s gesture. The american actress admitted that he has not always been the same.

Article Title: WNBA Superstars A’ja Wilson and Angel Reese join Stephen Curry’s GOAT
Article Text:
A'ja Wilson, Stephen Curry and Angel Reese (image via getty)

A'ja Wilson and Angel Reese join Stephen Curry's animated film GOAT

Impact on women's sports and media representation



When the lights go up in theaters on February 13, 2026, the silver screen will showcase a level of star power that fans of both the NBA and WNBA have been dreaming of. Stephen Curry’s highly anticipated animated feature, GOAT, has officially added two of the biggest names in women's basketball to its cast: Angel Reese and A’ja Wilson. Joining a lineup that already features Hollywood heavyweights like Gabrielle Union and David Harbour, the addition of these hoopers marks a massive cultural bridge between professional basketball and mainstream entertainment.Produced by a living legend, Stephen Curry, the film centers on an underdog story. A little goat, Will, dreams of playing roarball, a high-intensity sport, but his physical limitations obstruct him. It will follow his journey from being looked down upon to overcoming all barriers and rewriting the rules. Sounds familiar? Do you feel Curry’s story could be reflected through Will?For any dedicated WNBA watcher, the pairing of Reese and Wilson is a game recognize game moment. Both Wilson and Reese are coming off a historic 2025 season where one former won her 4th WNBA MVP award, 2nd Finals MVP, 3rd DPOY, and led the Aces to their 3rd championships in the last 4 years. These accolades don’t finish just here. Wilson is an elite offensive and defensive powerhouse. She also led the 2025 season as the highest point scorer with 2025. Now set to play a reptile named Kouyate, in Curry’s GOAT money, the fans can’t wait to see how the MVP plays out her role on the big screen.Angel Reese, on the other hand, has been writing, redefining what WNBA stardom is. She set the league record in rebounds with 12.6 in 2025, and is leveraging her online presence to slowly build her own brand empire. Barely two years into her career, and she’s already headlining games and fashion shows. In the movie, fans will see her voicing a polar bear named Propp.The genius of this casting lies in its authenticity. By having actual champions and record-breakers voice these characters, Curry’s Unanimous Media is leaning into the specific it factor that has driven WNBA viewership to record highs over the last year. Both Wilson and Reese made an impact on women’s sports beyond the hardwood.The release of GOAT represents a pivotal shift in how women's sports stars are marketed to the next generation. Traditionally, WNBA players were relegated to the sidelines of sports media, but this film places them at the center of a major Sony Pictures Animation production alongside the greatest shooter in NBA history.This visibility is a power move for the WNBA's brand. By appearing in a family-friendly animated film, Reese and Wilson are being introduced to Gen Alpha and younger fans who may not yet be regular league pass subscribers. It’s a flywheel effect: movie stardom breeds cultural relevance, which in turn drives jersey sales and ticket stubs. As the WNBA prepares for further expansion into markets like Portland and Toronto in 2026, having its biggest stars become household names through cinema is the ultimate fast-break toward long-term growth.Also read: The top 5 most expensive contracts in WNBA right now: Kelsey Mitchell, Jackie Young, and more
Article Summary: A'ja wilson and angel reese join stephen curry's animated film goat. The addition of these hoopers marks a massive cultural bridge between professional basketball and mainstream entertainment. The release of goat represents a pivotal shift in how women's sports stars are marketed to the next generation.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumors: What’s really going on with Dougie Hamilton and New Jersey Devils?
Article Text:
Dougie Hamilton (Image Via Twitter)

Why are teams still monitoring a potential Dougie Hamilton trade?



CHAOS: Why Are Devils ABANDONING Dougie Hamilton—Is San Jose Next in SHOCK TRADE?

Once again, the New Jersey Devils are involved in trade rumors, and Dougie Hamilton’s name is one of the most mentioned in this regard, as teams are still looking for opportunities to upgrade their defense through the back line. Moving their star defenseman has become a subject of debate among both fans and insiders, but the initial signs point out that more of a watch-and-wait situation rather than a deal about to be done is at stake here.TSN’s Pierre LeBrun reports that there is no signal at present that a Dougie Hamilton trade is on the cards. Notwithstanding, the situation still stays dynamic, mainly due to Hamilton's contract situation, which has two more years to run and comes with a huge $9 million cap hit.Josh Wegman from The Score reported that a little while ago, Sportsnet's Elliotte Friedman made it known that Hamilton was not keen on moving to the San Jose Sharks. Recently, San Jose has turned out to be a surprise playoff contender, and the possibility that Hamilton might change his mind if the interest is revived has been talked about among the league watchers. Wegman additionally mentioned the Nashville Predators and a possible return to the Calgary Flames, but those both seem unlikely because of the team’s direction and contract issues.James Murphy from RG.Org gave extra insight that the Utah Mammoth were also interested last summer and could reacquaint through talks. At the same time, the Detroit Red Wings, Toronto Maple Leafs, and Vegas Golden Knights keep a close watch on the situation. Detroit and Utah are the two that get attention, as both have over $26 million in cap space, in addition to good draft and prospect assets.Cap limitations complicate the situation for Toronto and Vegas unless they are willing to move or take on some salary. Terry Koshan of the Toronto Sun and Kevin McGran of the Toronto Star both reported that Leafs GM Brad Treliving is still on the hunt for defense upgrades, with contract decisions within the organization possibly influencing the team’s trade flexibility as the March 6 deadline approaches.At this point, Dougie Hamilton is still a Devil, but the interest from other teams in the league has not diminished. It's tough to see this plot as over with the mix of salary cap difficulties, timing, and team direction.Also Read: NHL Trade Rumors: Ottawa Senators linked to Rasmus Andersson while Vancouver Canucks and Edmonton Oilers explore changes
Article Summary: The new jersey devils are involved in trade rumors, and dougie hamilton’s name is one of the most mentioned in this regard. The initial signs point out that more of a watch-and-wait situation rather than a deal about to be done is at stake here. Detroit red wings, toronto maple leafs, and vegas golden knights keep a close watch on the situation.

Article Title: MLB trade rumors: Los Angeles Dodgers could bag $240 million Toronto Blue Jays superstar and here's why
Article Text:
Colorado Rockies at Los Angeles Dodgers (Image via Imagn)

What the Contract Could Look Like

Why the Los Angeles Dodgers Are Interested in Bo Bichette

Performance Snapshot

Season AVG/OBP/SLG Hits HR RBI WAR Def (UZR/150) 2025

Who Benefits Most

The Los Angeles Dodgers are being widely viewed as the most serious destination for free agent infielder Bo Bichette. Around the league, few teams appear willing or able to meet his reported $240-300 million asking range. As a result, Los Angeles has separated itself as the only club clearly positioned to make a deal work.The plan, as currently discussed, would involve moving Bo Bichette to second base. That alignment keeps Mookie Betts flexible while addressing a position that quietly became a problem for the Los Angeles Dodgers last season. The fit is more about lineup balance than star power, even though the name value is undeniable.The expected framework is an eight-year deal worth between $240 million and $300 million. Annual value would likely land in the $25-30 million range, with a front-loaded structure and a player opt-out after the fourth season. This allows Los Angeles to limit long-term risk while still making a strong commitment.For Toronto, the situation resolves cleanly through free agency. There are no trade discussions involved.The Toronto Blue Jays avoid the risk of a rejected qualifying offer and would receive compensatory draft picks. Los Angeles, already projected near a $288 million payroll for 2026, can absorb the contract without changing its overall approach, similar to how it handled the Shohei Ohtani deal.Second base production was a clear weakness last season. Los Angeles Dodgers hitters at the position combined for a .649 OPS, ranking near the bottom of the league. Bichette’s career .294 batting average offers steady contact from the right side and helps balance a lineup built around Freddie Freeman and Ohtani.From Bo Bichette’s side, the move shifts him away from a roster entering a transition phase and into a team built to contend every year. Toronto gains payroll flexibility and can redirect resources toward younger players, while also moving on from a defender whose glove has graded below average in recent seasons.Bichette is 27 years old, born March 5, 1998. He is a two-time American League hits leader and a Silver Slugger winner, even as injuries and defensive decline have complicated his recent seasons.Los Angeles adds a reliable bat at a position of need and keeps its competitive window wide open through the end of the decade. The risks are real, health, defense, and blocked prospects like Freeland, but manageable given the roster depth.Also read: MLB Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Dodgers emerge as lone Big-Money Suitor for $300 million AL hits leader prior free agency Bichette secures a long-term deal and consistent postseason exposure. Toronto gains flexibility and future assets. If completed, the move reinforces how the Dodgers continue to separate themselves financially and competitively from the rest of the league.
Article Summary: The los angeles dodgers are being widely viewed as the most serious destination for free agent infielder bo bichette. The expected framework is an eight-year deal worth between $240 million and $300 million. Annual value would likely land in the $25-30 million range, with a front-loaded structure.

Article Title: Stephen Curry’s father Dell Curry gets heartfelt honor from Charlotte Hornets for his astonishing basketball legacy
Article Text:
Dell Curry. Image via: Jacob Kupferman / Getty Images

Charlotte Hornets set to retire Dell Curry’s jersey



Dell Curry’s impact extends beyond the court and into the community



The former Charlotte Hornets sharpshooter Dell Curry recently received a heartfelt accolade. The franchise informed him that No. 30 will be retired on March 19 during a home game against the Orlando Magic. Dell, who is the father of Stephen and Seth Curry, had a remarkable career in the league with astonishing stats.Curry’s career was crucial in shaping the early identity of the Hornets. Also, his connection to the city never faded after retirement. The honor places him among the most enduring figures the organization has known.Dell Curry played 10 of his 16 NBA seasons in Charlotte after arriving through the 1988 expansion draft. Over that span, he became one of the league’s most reliable perimeter threats and a steady presence for a young franchise. He retired as Charlotte’s all-time leader in points and three-point field goals made, marks that stood for years. He still ranks near the top in games played, scoring, and shooting efficiency.“I never imagined it would happen,” Curry said. “It means so much to me. I do it because it’s what I love to do.The game gave me so much, the fans gave me so much and I want to stay involved just to give back what I can and make this organization what it should be and give the fans, the team and the broadcast and the show that it’s fun, we’re having a great time and come celebrate, come support. ... Man, it would be an injustice to try to put into words what this means. ”Hornets' leadership also shared their thoughts on the decision. “Dell Curry has been a cornerstone of the Charlotte Hornets for more than 25 years, both on and off the court,” Rick Schnall and Gabe Plotkin said.“He exemplifies what it means to be a Hornet through his professionalism, work ethic and commitment to excellence. Dell’s impact on our organization, our fans and our community is undeniable, and he is truly deserving of this honor.”Curry’s bond with Charlotte did not end when his playing days did. He has spent 17 seasons as the team’s television analyst, bringing familiarity and trust to broadcasts while staying connected to fans. Combined with his playing career, his time with the organization spans more than two decades.The city also watched his family grow. Stephen and Seth Curry developed their games in Charlotte gyms, while the community followed their paths through college and into the NBA. That shared history deepened the connection. “I still love the game. I love the fans. I love their interaction, not only in the arena, but when I go out to the community, I’m one of them. And they treat me as such, my whole family as such,” Curry said.When No. 30 rises to the rafters, it will honor Dell’s contribution to the franchise while celebrating his love for the city.Also Read: “Everything else doesn’t matter”: LeBron James sent a heartfelt message to fans supporting him throughout his 23-year career
Article Summary: Charlotte hornets set to retire dell curry’s jersey on march 19. No. 30 will be retired during a home game against the orlando magic. Curry played 10 of his 16 nba seasons in charlotte after arriving through the 1988 expansion draft. The honor places him among the most enduring figures the organization has known.

Article Title: “Their love is unconditional”: Vanessa Bryant breaks silence on what helped her survive the unimaginable loss of Kobe Bryant and Gianna Bryant
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant opens up about moving on from losing Kobe Bryant and Gianna Bryant.(Image via Araya Doheny/Getty, Andrew D. Bernstein/NBAE via Getty)

Kobe Bryant’s wife, Vanessa Bryant, opens up about life after that unfortunate day



Kobe Bryant’s wife, Vanessa Bryant, continues to manage his legacy and their family



It will soon be six years since the tragic and untimely deaths of Kobe Bryant and his teenage daughter, Gianna “Gigi” Bryant, left the world mourning. Kobe Bryant’s wife, Vanessa Bryant, has remained strong even as she faced immense grief.Six years later since that fateful day, Vanessa Bryant continues to raise their three daughters alone as she has also earned a name for being a popular philanthropist. Amid all the tragic events that she has faced, Kobe Bryant’s wife, Vanessa Bryant, has opened up about how she manages her grief.A few months ago, Kobe Bryant’s wife, Vanessa Bryant, spoke to PEOPLE about how she keeps going after losing both her husband and daughter.Kobe Bryant’s wife, Vanessa Bryant, said, “Kobe and Gigi motivate me to keep going…”The popular philanthropist added, “They inspire me to try harder and be better every day.”Vanessa Bryant continued, “Their love is unconditional and they motivate me in so many different ways.”Vanessa Bryant has inspired billions of fans around the world with the generosity, humbleness and strength she has shown over the last few years.Back in January 2020, when Kobe Bryant and Gianna “Gigi” Bryant’s death sparked panic worldwide, Vanessa Bryant had shared her grief.Vanessa Bryant had said, "I'm not sure what our lives hold beyond today, and it's impossible to imagine life without them. But we wake up each day, trying to keep pushing because Kobe, and our baby girl, Gigi, are shining on us to light the way.”The popular philanthropist added, “Our love for them is endless - and that's to say, immeasurable. I just wish I could hug them, kiss them and bless them. Have them here with us, forever."As Kobe Bryant left his legacy behind, Vanessa Bryant has taken it up as her responsibility as she relaunched their nonprofit as the Mamba and Mambacita Foundation in homage to her late husband and daughter.Apart from this, Vanessa Bryant continues to be a strong parent and a pillar for their three daughters, over the last few years.Also Read: “I don’t have many years left”: Stephen Curry breaks silence on his future in the league as Ayesha Curry stands by him
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant opens up about moving on from losing kobe bryant and gianna bryant. It will soon be six years since the tragic and untimely deaths of bryant and his teenage daughter, gianna ‘gigi’ bryant. Vanessa bryant continues to raise their three daughters alone.

Article Title: NHL Trade Update: Montreal Canadiens sign forward Alexandre Texier to $5 million contract extension
Article Text:
Alexandre Texier turning opportunity into impact for Montreal Canadiens (Image via: Getty Images)

Montreal Canadiens sign former St. Louis forward Alexandre Texier to a multi-year contract deal

Also read:

In an attempt to bolster the Montreal Canadiens’ strength, the club has recently signed forward Alexandre Texier to a two-year, $5million contract extension on Wednesday. Starting next season, Texier will have a $2.5 million average annual value (AAV) with the Habs. This multi-year contract extension is not very surprising, as he has made commendable progress in his career in a brief period of time after being associated with the Canadiens.According to reports, the 26-year-old started the season with the St. Louis Blues, but after a slow start, the team terminated his contract, making him a free agent. Texier signed a one-year, $1 million deal with the Canadiens in November. Since signing with the Canadiens after mutually terminating his contract with the St. Louis Blues in November, the 26-year-old forward has proven to be an excellent fit in Montreal.In 25 games since signing with the Canadiens, Texier has recorded seven goals, nine assists, 16 points, and a plus-7 rating, proving that he would be a great fit for the team. Let’s take a look at his trade deal with the Canadiens more closely.The Montreal Canadiens club has signed former St. Louis forward Alexandre Texier to a multi-year contract deal on Wednesday. The forward has agreed to a two-year contract extension that carries an average annual value of $2.5 million, Texier’s agent announced. Posting the same on X/Twitter, Dan Milstein wrote, “Congratulations to our client Alexandre Texier on signing 2-year $2.5mm AAV contract extension with the Montréal #GoHabsGo Canadiens. #WeAreGoldStar!”It is to be noted that Texier joined the Canadiens on a one-year, $1-million deal on Nov.23 after the St. Louis Blues terminated his contract. Reports suggest that he has already become an important addition to the team, as after being placed at the right wing of the Canadiens’ top line with Nick Suzuki and Cole Caufield, Texier has produced four goals and six assists in eight games.The 26-year-old from France has impressed in Montreal with seven goals and nine assists through 25 games, after registering just one assist in eight outings with the Blues. Besides, he also scored a hat trick in Montreal's 6-2 win over the Florida Panthers on Jan. 8.The six-foot-one, 196-pound Canadiens forward has appeared in 265 career NHL regular-season games, recording 47 goals and 60 assists. The Montreal Canadiens will be next seen in action representing his country France, at February's Milan Cortina Olympic Games to be held in February 2026.
Article Summary: Montreal canadiens sign former st. louis forward alexandre texier to a multi-year contract deal. The forward has agreed to a two-year deal that carries an average annual value of $2.5 million. Texier signed a one-year, $1 million deal with the canadiens in november.

Article Title: Tiger Woods injury update: Latest injury and recovery insights, amid continued absence from TGL
Article Text:
Tiger Woods injury update: Latest injury and recovery insights, amid continued absence from TGL

Tiger Woods says the game is frustrating to watch from the outside



Will Tiger Woods team with Jupiter Link GC compete



Boston Common GC vs Bay GC





Atlanta Drive GC vs Jupiter Links GC





Bay GC vs Los Angeles GC





Atlanta Drive GC vs Boston Common GC





Los Angeles GC vs Atlanta Drive GC





New York GC vs Bay GC





Boston Common GC vs New York GC





Jupiter link GC vs Boston Common GC

Los Angeles GC vs New York GC





Bay GC vs Jupiter link GC

Tiger Woods has given updates about his latest status, on his recovery since surgery. The renowned golfer shared that he was moving to short irons, but before returning to action, he still needs more time to recover.Tiger Woods witnessed the TGL match between his side, Jupiter Links GC, and New York Golf on Tuesday, January 13, at the SoFi Center in Florida. The 15-time major champion wasn't here to cheer on and support the team in their debut match. During the post-game press conference, Woods was asked about his chances to compete in season 2 of the tech-infused league. The professional golfer also shared the details about his rehab after undergoing back surgery last year."Well, I'm moving up to short irons, so that's about it," he answered. "I need a little bit more than that to be able to play here. At my speed right now, I could probably play the Stinger hole. Just kind of roll it off the tee. But no, I'm progressing, which is nice. I'm getting there and getting stronger."He added, "It's just one of those things where it just takes so much time for the bone to heal and the bone to set."Tiger Woods, the 82-time PGA Tour winner, claimed that the game was quite frustrating to watch from the outside."Participating and playing, yes, it is nerve-racking," he continued. "I'm not going to say it's not. But at least I have control. Watching my son play or watching these guys play out there, I have no control over that.""I'm hoping they do their very best. I'm wishing for nothing but the best outcomes at all times, and it's frustrating when my son doesn't play well because he puts his heart and soul into it.”Earlier in the season, Jupiter Links GC had a difficult start, losing to the New York Golf Club 8-3. Tiger Woods' team started well with three points in the first four holes, but NYGC turned the game around and didn't let the opponents add another point.Jupiter Links GC, led by Tiger Woods, will play its second match against the Los Angeles Golf Club on Tuesday, January 20. Both teams will look for their first win after facing a defeat in their respective opening matches.Monday, January 26:Monday, February 2:Monday, February 9:Monday, February 23:Tuesday, February 24:Sunday, March 1:Monday, March 2:Tuesday, March 3:Also read: Tiger Woods celebrates 50 in style as athletes, celebrities and a rock legend join his red-themed night
Article Summary: Tiger woods witnessed the tgl match between his side, jupiter links gc, and new york golf on tuesday, january 13. The 15-time major champion wasn't here to cheer on and support the team in their debut match. Woods was asked about his chances to compete in season 2 of the tech-infused league.

Article Title: “MVP (Most Violations Player)”: Fans react to Dillon Brooks surpassing Green and Booker to become NBA’s technical foul leader
Article Text:
Dillon Brooks leads the NBA in technical fouls this season with 14, inching closer to a suspension. His aggressive playstyle, which often draws whistles, has sparked fan reactions and comparisons to Draymond Green. Despite the fouls, Brooks remains a key scorer for the Suns, who narrowly lost to the Heat.

Fans react to Dillon Brooks’ leading 2025-26 in technical fouls



Fans react to Dillon Brooks becoming NBA’s technical foul leader (image via X)

Fans react to Dillon Brooks becoming NBA’s technical foul leader (Image via X)

Dillon Brooks is just a step away from reaching a century in technical fouls. This season, he has stepped almost 40 times on the court, and nearly had at least one technical foul call every three games. He picked up his league-leading 14th tech call on Tuesday in Miami against the Heat while being on offense. Yes, he had the ball advantage, and any contact while going for the rim would have resulted in free throws in favour of Suns.But Brooks and tech fouls go hand in hand, and after losing the possession against Heat’s Norman Powell’s defense, the duo appeared heated, leading to the referees calling a tech on Brooks.This season, Suns’ Brooks lead NBA in tech calls, followed by Warriors' defensive cornerstone, Draymond Green, with 9, and then Lakers’ superstar Luka Doncic is tied with Green with 9, and following him is Suns’ another entry, Devin Booker, with 6 tech calls.Brooks’s aggressive and unbending playing style and ability to get under people's skin have often put him in the limelight on court. In his rookie year, he had five techincals, and since the 2020-21 season, he kept it above 10. For the 2025-26 season, he already has 14 technicals, two more, and he’ll be facing a one-game suspension.After picking up his 14th tech foul in yesterday’s game against the Miami Heat, Brooks needs to tread carefully and should avoid any more whistles.But fans are not avoiding any chance to react to Brooks’ technical saga. One fan commented, “Brooks running away with MVP (Most Violations Player) race.” A second fan wrote, “Brooks wants to technical foul is way back to the Rockets.” while the third fan said, “Brooks just got max passion and a good rage baiter. ”A fan tagged Green’s official account and wrote, “are you gonna let dillon brooks of all people steal your flow?” Well, if not for Brooks, Green would have been leading the list.Another fan commented, “And yall said draymond was terrible lol. Don’t pay attention to the noise warriors and draymond.” Some fans wrote how they had guessed all the names but the last one on the list was a surprise, “ Would guessed ¾. Booker not so much."The Suns lost to Heat in a close contest of 121-127, all thanks to the latter’s 35 point stream in the 4th quarter. Bam Adebayo was Heat’s leading scorer with 29 points, followed by Norman Powell’s 27 points. Despite the tech call, Dillon Brooks came as Suns’ top scorer with 24 points and 4 rebounds and went 11-of-24 from the field.Also read: Shaquille O’Neal stirs up the goat conversation by crowning Michael Jordan and putting Kobe Bryant over LeBron James
Article Summary: Dillon brooks leads the nba in technical fouls this season with 14, inching closer to a suspension. His aggressive playstyle, which often draws whistles, has sparked fan reactions and comparisons to draymond green. Despite the fouls, brooks remains a key scorer for the suns, who narrowly lost to the heat.

Article Title: Is Andrea Bocelli performing at the 2026 Winter Olympics Opening Ceremony in Milan?
Article Text:
Andrea Bocelli (via Getty Images)

Andrea Bocelli to headline opening ceremony of 2026 Winter Olympics in Milan



World-famous Italian tenor Andrea Bocelli will take part in the opening ceremony of the XXV Winter Olympic Games in 2026. The ceremony will be held on February 6 in Milan. Bocelli is the second major star confirmed for the event after Mariah Carey . Organizers have not yet revealed whether the two singers will perform together or appear separately on stage.Bocelli will pause his world tour to perform at the ceremony. His participation adds major star power to the show. The opening ceremony is expected to be one of the biggest cultural moments of the Games. With music, sport, and global attention combined, Milan is preparing for a spectacular start to the Winter Olympics.The opening ceremony will include the traditional Parade of Athletes and is expected to last around three hours. Organizers are planning performances across multiple locations to highlight the size and international spirit of the Games. These locations are designed to showcase Milan and its cultural identity to a worldwide audience.Italian actress Sabrina Impacciatore is expected to appear during the ceremony. She is widely known for her role in the hit series The White Lotus. Actress Matilda De Angelis is also rumored to be part of the show.She became popular after starring in the Netflix series The Law According to Lydia Poet. Their involvement would further strengthen the ceremony’s artistic appeal.The Olympic flame-lighting ceremony took place on November 26, 2025. For the first time, it was held inside an archaeological museum rather than an open public square. This choice reflected a blend of history and modern presentation.The closing ceremony is scheduled for February 22. World-renowned ballet dancer Roberto Bolle is expected to be the main performer on that night. His appearance would bring a classical and elegant finish to the Games.Andrea Bocelli’s role adds emotional weight to the opening. He is known worldwide for combining opera with pop music. One of his most famous songs is “The Prayer,” a duet with Celine Dion that gained global recognition.Bocelli also has a strong connection with Ukraine. He has performed there multiple times, including a major concert in Kyiv in 2017. After Russia’s full-scale invasion, he publicly expressed support for Ukraine. In 2022, he even sheltered a dog rescued from Kupiansk.Fans now eagerly await February 6, when Bocelli is set to deliver a powerful musical moment on one of sport’s biggest stages.Also Read: Simone Biles net worth timeline (2016 to 2026): Gymnastics icon builds a powerful brand in the past decade
Article Summary: Italian tenor andrea bocelli will take part in the opening ceremony of the xxv winter olympic games in 2026. The ceremony will be held on february 6 in milan. The opening ceremony is expected to be one of the biggest cultural moments of the games.

Article Title: Mike Tomlin’s hilarious mic’d-up moment with Broderick Jones goes viral following the end of his Steelers era
Article Text:
Mike Tomlin (via Getty Images)

Why that unscripted moment now defines Tomlin’s legacy

As Mike Tomlin steps away from the Pittsburgh Steelers, one of his most memorable mic’d-up moments is going viral, and the timing couldn’t have been better. The clip captured Tomlin at his most authentic, reacting instantly when lineman Broderick Jones realized the cameras were still on. The coach had no inhibitions even when faced by reporters with cameras.As the tackle asked the coach whether he was mic’d up, Tomlin’s answer was equal parts blunt and equal parts hilarious, while the spectators were left giggling. That raw exchange has resurfaced just hours after Tomlin confirmed he is stepping down, closing the book on an undisputed and unparalleled 19-season run with the team.As Jones inquired about the mic to his coach. Tomlin had the most savage reply, saying, “Shut up, shut your *** up, let’s go”, much to the tackle’s embarrassment. The viral mic’d-up clip resonates now as it reflects how players experienced him daily. When Jones hesitated after noticing the camera, Tomlin’s response proved that he had no filter with or without the camera.Tomlin’s exit came one day after Pittsburgh’s latest playoff disappointment. Since taking over in 2007, Tomlin built a résumé few coaches can match. He never had a losing season, guided the Steelers to 13 playoff appearances, won eight division titles, and lifted a Super Bowl trophy.In a league where coaches rarely last five years, Tomlin became an anomaly and was what the team needed.In his statement announcing the decision to step down, Tomlin thanked the organization, players, and fans, calling his tenure an “extraordinary honor.” He also expressed his gratitude for having the privilege to lead the team successfully for many years and also added that he is now looking forward to the team’s future prospects.Now, Pittsburgh faces a rare moment of uncertainty, as the franchise has had only three head coaches since 1969, and choosing the next one will shape its future for years. Tomlin leaves behind a legacy that will continue to be remembered for generations, and his successor will have a lot to live up to.Also read: What comes next for Mike Tomlin following Steelers’ latest postseason disappointment
Article Summary: Mike tomlin confirmed he is stepping down as head coach of the pittsburgh steelers. A clip of tomlin reacting to a mic-d-up moment is going viral. The coach had no inhibitions even when faced by reporters with cameras. Tomlin leaves behind a legacy that will be remembered for generations.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes’ playoff TD record stands firm as Chiefs sit out this postseason
Article Text:
Image via Getty

A record untouched without even playing

Why this matters for Patrick Mahomes’ legacy

Also Read:

The 2025 NFL playoffs feel a little strange without the Patrick Mahomes-led Kansas City Chiefs. For the first time in more than a decade, the Chiefs are not part of the postseason picture. Yet, even while watching from the sidelines, Mahomes still managed to hold on to a major playoff milestone.Mahomes, who turned 30 this season, remains second on the NFL’s all-time list for playoff touchdown passes. That record stayed untouched during the Wild Card round, despite a rare opportunity for it to change.What makes this situation striking is that Mahomes did not need to take a single snap this postseason to protect his record. With the Chiefs missing the playoffs after a disappointing 2025 campaign, Mahomes could only watch as other quarterbacks attempted and failed to close the gap.Rodgers needed just two playoff touchdown passes to overtake Mahomes. Instead, his Wild Card outing ended scoreless through the air, with turnovers proving costly. As a result, Mahomes officially cannot drop below second place on the all-time playoff touchdown list this season.The only player still comfortably ahead is Tom Brady, whose playoff touchdown total remains the gold standard. Brady’s postseason résumé is nearly unmatched, but Mahomes’ pace has kept him firmly in the conversation, even with fewer playoff appearances.Because the Chiefs failed to qualify for the playoffs this year, Mahomes had no chance to add to his total. That also means he could not close the gap on Brady at the top. However, the silver lining for Kansas City fans is clear: Mahomes cannot lose his second-place spot, no matter how the rest of the playoffs unfold.The absence of the Chiefs from postseason football has been one of the biggest surprises of the 2025 season. Injuries, including Mahomes’ late-season ACL tear, and overall team struggles led to a disappointing 6-11 finish. It marked the end of a long playoff streak under head coach Andy Reid.Even so, Mahomes’ playoff resume continues to shine. His past postseason runs, filled with comeback wins and clutch performances, built a cushion that protected his standing this year.Watching an NFL postseason without Mahomes feels unusual. But it may not last long. If history is any guide, the Chiefs and their star quarterback will be back soon. And when Mahomes returns to the playoff stage, his slow but steady chase of Brady’s legendary record will continue.For now, one thing is certain: Patrick Mahomes’ playoff touchdown record remains safe even in a season he didn’t play.
Article Summary: Patrick mahomes is second on the nfl’s all-time list for playoff touchdown passes. Mahomes did not need to take a single snap this postseason to protect his record. Because the chiefs failed to qualify for the playoffs this year, mahomes had no chance to add to his total.

Article Title: Jayden Daniels injury update: Commanders QB set to play in Tom Brady’s Saudi Flag Football Classic
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

Jayden Daniels’ injury timeline explained

What the Saudi Flag Football Classic involves

Also Read:

Washington Commanders quarterback Jayden Daniels is officially returning to the field, ending weeks of uncertainty around his injury status. The young QB is set to take part in Fanatics Flag Football Classic in Saudi Arabia, an announcement that also confirms he has recovered from the injuries that limited his 2025 NFL season.The update came directly from Tom Brady, who revealed Daniels as one of the team captains during the launch of Fanatics Studios. The event will be held in Riyadh in March and will feature several current and former NFL stars competing in an Olympic-style flag football format.Daniels played just seven games during the 2025 season before suffering a dislocated elbow in a heavy loss to the Minnesota Vikings in December. The injury effectively ended his year and raised concerns about how quickly he would be able to return to football activities.While the Commanders have stayed quiet about detailed medical updates, Daniels’ inclusion in the Saudi Arabia event is a strong sign that his recovery has gone well. Participating as a team captain suggests he is not only healthy but also trusted to handle leadership responsibilities on the field.The Fanatics Flag Football Classic will feature three teams, each captained by an NFL quarterback. Brady will captain one team, Daniels another, with a third captain yet to be announced. Games will follow five-on-five Olympic-style flag football rules, played on a shorter field with two 20-minute halves.Several big NFL names are expected to take part, including Saquon Barkley, Christian McCaffrey, CeeDee Lamb, Myles Garrett and Rob Gronkowski. The games will be broadcast live on Fox Sports and Tubi, giving fans worldwide a chance to watch Daniels back in action.For Washington, Daniels’ return even in an exhibition setting is encouraging. The 2024 Offensive Rookie of the Year showed flashes of promise before injuries slowed him down. In his limited appearances last season, Daniels threw for over 1,200 yards with eight touchdowns, showing growth despite difficult circumstances.This event offers Daniels a low-risk way to regain rhythm and confidence before offseason programs begin. It also reassures fans that his elbow injury is no longer a major concern heading into the 2026 NFL season.Brady and Daniels are on stage together, offers Daniels worldwide exposure and boosts his confidence after a terrible year. The Commanders' season ended early, but their presence shows that Daniels is ready to go on.Right now, the focus is on opportunity instead of injury concerns. Jayden Daniels is back on the field, healthy, and getting ready to lead again, this time in Saudi Arabia under the bright lights.
Article Summary: Washington commanders quarterback jayden daniels set to take part in fanatics flag football classic in saudi arabia. The event will be held in riyadh in march and will feature several current and former nfl stars competing in an olympic-style flag football format.

Article Title: Travis Kelces’s ex Kayla Nicole stunned reaction to Mike Tomlin stepping away from Steelers echoes bittersweet sentiments within the NFL
Article Text:
Kayla Nicole (via Getty Images)

A short reaction that echoed a much bigger NFL moment

News broke recently that Mike Tomlin stepped down as head coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers after 19 seasons. It was the end of one of the league’s most stable and respected coaching tenures, and reactions from fans, players, and media personalities poured in, showing immense gratitude to the coach.Among them was Kayla Nicole, who is no stranger to being vocal about big happenings around the NFL. Known for her past relationship with Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce and her continued presence around the league, Nicole expressed her shock when hearing the news, as she seemed to have the greatest respect for Tomlin like many others.ESPN first reported Tomlin’s departure from the Steelers through an Instagram post, highlighting his long run in Pittsburgh and his unmatched consistency. Nicole reshared the post on her Instagram story and added a simple caption: “OMG.” Tomlin joined the Steelers in 2007 and never once finished a season with a losing record, a rare achievement in modern NFL history.In his farewell statement, Tomlin stated that he was grateful and felt blessed to have led the team. He said, "This organization has been a huge part of my life for many years, and it has been an absolute honor to lead this team. I am deeply grateful to Art Rooney II and the late Ambassador Rooney for their trust and support. I am also thankful to the players who gave everything they had every day…He also thanked his team and players for giving their hard & soul to the game and making his job easier.According to ESPN insider Adam Schefter, Tomlin is not expected to coach during the 2026 season, signaling that this decision is about stepping back from the role for quite a while.This was not the only time that Nicole made her opinions known about significant NFL news. She also recently showed support for San Francisco 49ers tight end George Kittle after he suffered a torn Achilles in the wild-card playoff loss to the Eagles. After Kittle shared a heartfelt message about his injury, Nicole wished him to get well soon and praised his immense dedication on the field.Also read: “Until you look at that bill”: Travis Kelce's ex Kayla Nicole calls out the hidden financial weight of egg freezing in new viral interview
Article Summary: Mike tomlin stepped down as head coach of the pittsburgh steelers after 19 seasons. Espn first reported tomlin’s departure through an instagram post, highlighting his long run in pittsburgh. Kayla nicole reshared the post on her instagram story and added a simple caption: “omg”

Article Title: LeBron James pens two-word message for Kyle Lowry’s emotional standing ovation at Toronto homecoming
Article Text:
Kyle Lowry (Image via Getty)

LeBron James reacts to Kyle Lowry receiving an emotional ovation in Toronto homecoming

LeBron James' Instagram story

Kyle Lowry Receives A HUGE Standing Ovation In Final Game In Toronto!

Despite losing the game against the Philadelphia 76ers, Toronto Raptors fans could not hold back their emotions after seeing Kyle Lowry at the Scotiabank Arena. The former Raptors star received a standing ovation during his first appearance in Toronto after a long time. Even the NBA legend LeBron James could not stop himself from reacting to the Raptors’ heartwarming gesture towards Lowry.The Los Angeles Lakers’ cornerstone took to social media and wrote a two-word message defining what true sportsmanship leads to. However, the Philadelphia 76ers guard appeared for a brief period of time during the last hour of the game. For Kyle Lowry, the heart-touching moment will be etched in his life forever.Even after losing the recent game against the Philadelphia 76ers, the enthusiasm of Toronto Raptors fans was unmatched, all thanks to their beloved alum Kyle Lowry. The biggest highlight of the game came when only 1:57 mins were left. As Lowry stepped onto the court in the 76ers’ jersey, the crowd started chanting, “We want Lowry!” The 39-year-old former Raptor guard witnessed one of the best moments of his NBA career.Los Angeles Lakers’ icon LeBron James could not hold back from reacting to Lowry’s special moment. The NBA legend took to Instagram and posted a two-word message for the talented guard. His story mentioned,“Rightfully So!!!!!!!!”Overwhelmed with emotions, Kyle Lowry reflected on his stint with the Toronto Raptors. He said,"Our team came out with an extreme focus, and I think that was part of their plan, to make sure I got an opportunity to get in there. I’ve got some great teammates and a great coach who understands the moment, who I have a championship with, but it was a good team win for us. I got an opportunity to experience probably one of the greatest basketball moments of my personal career."The Philadelphia 76ers guard has spent nine years with the Raptors. The ongoing season marks his 20th in the NBA. Reportedly, Lowry has expressed his intention to retire as a Toronto Raptor by signing only one day’s contract. His commitment and dedication towards the Raptors speaks volumes about his love for the NBA franchise.Also Read: LeBron James lets daughter Zhuri James style him turning a Los Angeles Lakers off day into family fashion theatre
Article Summary: Kyle lowry received a standing ovation during his first appearance in toronto after a long time. The philadelphia 76ers guard appeared for a brief period of time during the last hour of the game. Even the nba legend lebron james could not stop himself from reacting to the heartwarming gesture towards lowry.

Article Title: Kevin Lankinen’s goal-line save leads Vancouver Canucks’ 38-save effort in narrow loss to Ottawa Senators
Article Text:
Kevin Lankinen’s 38 saves keep Canucks in the game against Senators (Image via: Getty Images)

Kevin Lankinen makes 38 saves, including a crucial goal-line stop, keeping Canucks in the game



Kevin Lankinen had a stellar performance with the Vancouver Canucks on Tuesday as he kept his team in the contest with a 2-1 loss to the Ottawa Senators at Canadian Tire Centre. The Canucks goalie made a number of important saves in the contest, among them a remarkable save at the goal line that demonstrated his quickness and positioning. Lankinen had recorded 38 saves, highlighting just how central he was to Vancouver’s defensive effort.The Senators were able to spend several periods with possession of the puck, trying to create opportunities against the Canucks, but Lankinen's composed performance as a goalkeeper made it even more difficult for the Senators to score a goal against Vancouver despite their best efforts on offense.The standout moment came in the second period, when Senators captain Brady Tkachuk fed a pass to Claude Giroux cutting to the crease. Giroux attempted to redirect the puck past Lankinen, but it ricocheted off the goalie’s leg. The puck slid behind him, and as Dylan Cozens moved in for a follow-up attempt, Lankinen showcased his agility and reach. Diving across the crease, he used his blocker to stop the puck just short of crossing the goal line. The sequence exemplified both his awareness and technical skill, keeping Vancouver alive in a tight contest.Despite Lankinen’s efforts, the Senators managed to edge out the Canucks by a single goal. Vancouver’s offense struggled to capitalize on rebounds and sustained pressure, leaving the team reliant on Lankinen to keep the score close. His 38-save night was one of the most impressive individual performances of the early season, demonstrating why he remains a key figure between the pipes.For the Canucks, Lankinen’s showing provides a clear takeaway: strong goaltending can keep the team competitive even in challenging matchups. While the loss adds pressure to Vancouver’s upcoming schedule, Lankinen’s performance offers reassurance that the team has a reliable last line of defense. Ottawa, meanwhile, gained a narrow but critical win, advancing their push in the standings while highlighting the importance of converting chances in tight games.
Article Summary: Kevin lankinen makes 38 saves, including a crucial goal-line stop, keeping canucks in the game against senators. Vancouver’s offense struggled to capitalize on rebounds and sustained pressure, leaving the team reliant on lankinen to keep the score close. Ottawa, meanwhile, gained a narrow but critical win, advancing their push in the standings.

Max Christie, on the other hand, has scored exceptionally this season, while averaging 12.3 points, 3.5 rebounds, and 2.1 assists per game.Also read: Phoenix Suns vs Miami Heat (01-13-2026) game preview: When and where to watch, expected lineup, injury report, prediction, and more

Article Title: Bryson DeChambeau faces $400 million dilemma as PGA Tour return looms with LIV deal expiring
Article Text:
Bryson DeChambeau (Image Source: Getty)

LIV contract talks halted as Bryson DeChambeau weighs PGA return



Bryson DeChambeau: 'LIV is not going anywhere' ⛳

Bryson DeChambeau could become the next major name to return to the PGA Tour. But the move would come at a huge financial cost. The American golfer would likely have to walk away from close to $400 million in future earnings. His current LIV Golf contract expires in August, and talks over a new deal have slowed.LIV Golf is keen to keep DeChambeau. The Saudi-backed league fears losing another big star after Brooks Koepka’s exit. With Tiger Woods sidelined, DeChambeau is now one of golf’s biggest attractions. At 32, he rivals Rory McIlroy in pulling power. LIV wants him signed before the new season begins in Riyadh on February 4.Negotiations between LIV Golf and Bryson DeChambeau have hit a pause. The golfer is pushing for a larger role in shaping LIV’s future. He also wants a deal far bigger than the near $100 million signing bonus he received in 2022. DeChambeau believes his value has grown sharply since then.He feels he deserves a contract similar to Jon Rahm’s reported $370 million deal from December 2023. During earlier talks, DeChambeau made it clear that LIV understands his importance. He explained that the league knows what he brings to the table and that he is fully aware of his global value.He also said he is excited about the future, but accepted that careers can take unexpected turns.DeChambeau pointed to Koepka’s exit as proof that big decisions can come suddenly. He suggested that players always act based on what suits their personal needs and goals. That comment highlighted his own uncertainty about staying with LIV.Walking away from LIV would be costly. DeChambeau would miss out on easy earnings from the lightly contested 2025 LIV season, where he made over $10 million. A PGA return would also require a $3.7 million charitable payment, similar to Koepka’s. On top of that, he would forgo potential millions from FedEx Cup bonuses and the Player Equity Programme.DeChambeau is one of only four LIV golfers eligible for a fast-track return to the PGA Tour. The Returning Member Programme is limited to recent Major winners. Alongside him are Koepka, Rahm, and Cameron Smith. Others, like Hudson Swafford, faced long bans after leaving LIV.Time is running out. The Returning Member Programme closes on February 2. That is just two days before LIV’s new season begins. DeChambeau must decide quickly whether to chase legacy or secure another massive payday.Also Read: Who was Masashi “Jumbo” Ozaki? The legendary Japanese golf star and hall of famer, who died at 78
Article Summary: Liv contract talks halted as bryson dechambeau weighs pga return. American golfer would likely have to walk away from close to $400 million in future earnings. His current liv golf contract expires in august, and talks over a new deal have slowed.

Article Title: Arber Xhekaj and Dylan McIlrath drop gloves during Montreal Canadiens Washington Capitals NHL match
Article Text:
Montréal Canadiens defenseman Arber Xhekaj (72) fights Washington Capitals defenseman Dylan McIlrath (52) during the second period of an NHL hockey game, Tuesday, Jan. 13, 2026, in Washington. (AP Photo/Nick Wass)

Arber Xhekaj Dylan McIlrath fight ignites Canadiens Capitals NHL game

The game between the Montreal Canadiens and the Washington Capitals today had all the makings of a hard-fought battle, but it was a moment of pure physicality that made the night stand out. From the first few minutes, both teams were on edge, finishing checks and pushing their limits in a game that seemed like it would boil over.That moment came in the middle of the game, when emotions ran high after a hard hit on a Canadiens defenseman, Montreal Canadiens defenseman Arber Xhekaj, who is known for being confrontational, didn't waste any time responding.The incident unfolded after Washington Capitals defenseman Dylan McIlrath laid a heavy check on Montreal Canadiens defenseman Jayden Struble. While the hit itself did not result in an immediate penalty, it drew a strong reaction from the Canadiens, with Xhekaj skating directly toward McIlrath to challenge him.Both players dropped the gloves near center ice, engaging in a classic heavyweight fight that energized the arena. Arber Xhekaj appeared to control the exchange, landing several clean punches and maintaining his balance as the two traded blows. Dylan McIlrath continued to answer back, showing his own toughness before the officials finally stepped in.McIlrath's anger was clear as the players were pulled apart, which added to the already tense NHL game result. The fight seemed to boost Montreal's spirits, while Washington focused on the physical side of the game for the rest of the game.The fight between Arber Xhekaj and Dylan McIlrath quickly made its way into the NHL news roundup, reminding everyone that being responsible for your actions still matters. In a league where speed and skill are important, things like this keep the momentum going and shape rivalries.Also Read: Sidney Crosby’s lifestyle: Inside Pittsburgh Penguins captain’s luxury watch collection and personal style
Article Summary: Montréal canadiens defenseman arber xhekaj and washington capitals defenseman dylan mcilrath engaged in a heavyweight fight. The fight came after a hard hit on a montreal defenseman. The game between the montreal canadiens and the washington capitals today had all the makings of a physical battle.
